description: Update an existing custom work order status
permissions: User must be an admin or a manager member of the broker organization for the status.
side_effects: Updates fields on an existing custom work order status.
validation_notes: Requires a status ID argument. Must specify at least one of --label, --description, --color-hex, --primary-status. If provided, primary-status must be one of: editing, ready_for_work, in_progress, on_hold, completed. If provided, color-hex must be a valid hex color (#RGB or #RRGGBB). If provided, label must be present and unique per broker (case-insensitive).

flags.name: --color-hex
flags.validation: Must be a valid hex color (#RGB or #RRGGBB).

flags.name: --primary-status
flags.validation: Must be one of: editing, ready_for_work, in_progress, on_hold, completed.
